markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[No Evidence](/Feats.aspx?ID=2323) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

</column>

---

You leave little sign when attempting to remain unseen. When you [Avoid Notice](/Actions.aspx?ID=511), you also gain the benefits of [Cover Tracks](/Actions.aspx?ID=65) unless you choose not to.
name: No Evidence
